Package gw.currency.fxrate

Class DefaultFXRateBuilder<B extends FXRateBuilder<DefaultFXRate,B>>

java.lang.Object
gw.currency.fxrate.DefaultFXRateBuilder<B>
All Implemented Interfaces:
FXRateBuilder<DefaultFXRate,B>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CCDefaultFXRateBuilder
public class DefaultFXRateBuilder<B extends FXRateBuilder<DefaultFXRate,B>> extends Object implements FXRateBuilder<DefaultFXRate,B>
Builder class for DefaultFXRate.

  • Constructor Details

    • DefaultFXRateBuilder

      public DefaultFXRateBuilder()
      Constructs an empty new Builder instance.

    • DefaultFXRateBuilder

      public DefaultFXRateBuilder(FXRate fxRate)
      Constructs a new Builder instance initialized with the values from the specified FXRate object.
      Parameters:
      fxRate - the FXRate object to copy values from

    • DefaultFXRateBuilder

      public DefaultFXRateBuilder(ExchangeRate exchangeRate)
      Constructs a new DefaultFXRateBuilder instance using the provided ExchangeRate object.

      Initializes the builder with the base currency, price currency, market, and rate from the given ExchangeRate.

      Parameters:
      exchangeRate - the ExchangeRate object to copy values from

    • DefaultFXRateBuilder

      public DefaultFXRateBuilder(FXExchangeRate fxExchangeRate)
      Constructs a new DefaultFXRateBuilder instance using the provided FXExchangeRate object.

      Initializes the builder with the base currency, from currency, to currency, market, rate, and market time from the given FXExchangeRate.

      Parameters:
      fxExchangeRate - the FXExchangeRate object to copy values from

    • withContext

      public final B withContext(FXRateContext context)
      Sets various attributes for the DefaultFXRate being built based on the provided FXRateContext. This method populates the from currency, to currency, market, market time, and base currency using values from the given FXRateContext.
      Parameters:
      context - the FXRateContext containing the details to set
      Returns:
      this Builder instance

    • build

      public final DefaultFXRate build()
      Constructs a new DefaultFXRate instance using the current state of the Builder.

      If the base currency is not set, the method defaults to the base currency as provided by FXRateContext.getBaseCurrency(), which uses CurrencyUtil.getDefaultCurrency().

      Specified by:
      build in interface FXRateBuilder<DefaultFXRate,B extends FXRateBuilder<DefaultFXRate,B>>
      Returns:
      a new DefaultFXRate instance
